meanings.sent1: The school was nonaccredited, so my diploma wasn't accepted everywhere.
meanings.sent2: She decided not to hire the nonaccredited contractor for the project.
meanings.sent3: The nonaccredited restaurant claimed to have the best food in town, but no one believed them.
meanings.sent4: His nonaccredited artwork may not hang in prestigious galleries, but it speaks to many people.
meanings.sent5: The nonaccredited product failed to meet safety standards, causing a recall.

meanings.definition: Not meeting the standards set by an accrediting body.
meanings.sent1: The nonaccredited program did not provide the necessary training for the students.
meanings.sent2: We had to choose a different supplier because the materials were nonaccredited.
meanings.sent3: The nonaccredited car dealership promised luxury vehicles but only had old beat-up cars.
meanings.sent4: Her nonaccredited essay lacked proper sources and citations, leading to a low grade.
meanings.sent5: The nonaccredited building failed to pass inspection due to safety concerns.
